footer.tagline: Your partner for sourcing and global trade from China.

heroSection.title: Your Bridge to Global Commerce
heroSection.subtitle: Expert sourcing, trading, and e-commerce solutions from the heart of China to the world.

servicesSection.title: Our Core Services
servicesSection.subtitle: Comprehensive solutions to boost your global business.

sourcing.title: Sourcing
sourcing.description: We find and validate the best manufacturers in China for your products, ensuring quality and competitive prices.

trading.title: Trading
trading.description: Facilitating smooth import/export operations, managing all logistics and customs for a seamless trade experience.

ecommerce.title: E-commerce Solutions
ecommerce.description: End-to-end support for your online store, from product sourcing to warehousing and order fulfillment.

custom.title: Custom Services
custom.description: Customized solutions tailored to your unique business needs, including factory audits and quality control.

aboutSection.title: Your Trusted Partner in China
aboutSection.p1: Founded on the principles of trust and efficiency, Global Trading China is more than just a trading company. We are your eyes and ears on the ground, dedicated to simplifying the complexities of international trade.
aboutSection.p2: Our mission is to connect businesses worldwide to the vast opportunities in China, offering local expertise, rigorous quality control, and transparent communication at every step.

processSection.title: Our Process from A to Z
processSection.subtitle: A transparent and efficient journey, from your idea to your doorstep.

step1.title: Initial Contact
step1.description: You contact us with your needs.

step2.title: Sourcing & Quote
step2.description: We find suppliers and provide a detailed quote.

step3.title: Quality Control
step3.description: Our team performs rigorous quality checks.

step4.title: Logistics
step4.description: We handle shipping, customs, and documents.

step5.title: Final Delivery
step5.description: Your products arrive safely at their destination.
